title: BEAUTIFUL 1 BEDROOM FOR SENIORS COMING OPEN IN SEPT
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 530 Sq.
Ft.
Woodlands at Forbes Lake is pleased to offer affordable senior living for adults 61+ (income restrictions apply).
With spacious 1 and 2 bedroom affordable senior apartments, Woodlands at Forbes Lake has much to offer, including airy floor plans with light, bright windows.
Enjoy a day around the community with activities like playing bingo, watching movies, or relaxing in our knitting nook.
Lush landscaping and lovely breezeways give you plenty of space to enjoy the outdoors, too.
Woodlands at Forbes Lake is conveniently located near public transportation, shopping, medical facilities, and restaurants in Kirkland, WA.
Senior living is the start of something new at Woodlands at Forbes Lake Senior Apartments.
Features:
Views of the pond with fountain*, Wide hallways and doorways, Accessible apartments available, Large closets*, Ample storage space*, Breakfast bar
Community Amenities:

Easy access to public transportation, Planned social activities, Business center, Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements, Lush landscaping, Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas, Controlled entry access with dedicated parking, Professional onsite management, Resident social lounge, Laundry facilities on every floor, Share the air: smoke-free community, Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply), Elevator access to all floors
Pet Policy
We are pet friendly!
Please visit our website for additional details.
